Daily subcutaneous injection self-administered receive designated individual use cool.click™ , needle-free growth hormone ( GH ) delivery device . The study consist three period : screening ( 30 day prior Study Day 1 ) , active treatment ( 24 week ) , follow-up ( 4 week safety evaluation last dose study medication ) .
